column1: Local Foods////The cashier recommended the crunchy chicken
column2: for the sides I got kale and couscous. When it was brought out
column3: the sandwich was gigantic. The chicken was moist and full of flavors from the fresh veggies and sauce. I couldn't stopped eating. In my opinion
column4: the sides had a little too much vinaigrette for my tasting
column5: but still good. It had plenty of parking and friendly service. I will be back.
